Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>All I wanted was those missing farm tools.
I didn't expect anything like this...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>But for Princess Zelda, I'll work
my hardest!
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>The falling ruins have been causing all
sorts of problems like this.<sp:0:4:0>But I heard that Princess Zelda was
working her hardest to take care of these
flowers. I couldn't let her do it alone!
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm going to make this the most beautiful
flower bed in the whole world to surprise
Princess Zelda!
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Princess Zelda could come back at any
moment, so I have to work my hardest.<sp:0:4:0>There's no way I can let a little rain slow
me down!
GoldHorse: That horse sure is a beaut.
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Princess Zelda could come back at any
moment, so I have to work my hardest.<sp:0:4:0>There's no time for sleep when there's
work to be done!
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Take a look at this beautiful flower bed!
Well...it might not look like much now,
but just you wait.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Ooh, Princess Zelda will be so surprised!
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>I'm sorry, Mr. Customer, but I haven't got
a single minute to spare right now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But the stable is open, so you can ask at
the <clr:0000>counter<clr:ffff> if you need anything.
